problem.markdown:
>>A surface is measured to have a high albedo. __________________________ are most commonly associated with high albedo.<<
[[(Snow covered surfaces), Forest covered surfaces, Oceans]]
>> __________________________ is associated with high albedo. <<
[[High heat absorption, (High reflectivity), High biodiversity]]
[explanation] Albedo is a measure of the fraction of light reflected from a surface. Snow covered surfaces have a high albedo. Examples include glaciers or sea ice. Forests and oceans generally have low albedos. A higher albedo indicates that the surface is more reflective. [explanation]
